resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107466</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107466</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202596</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making Patterns Make Sense</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muster Bildend, Seien Sie Sinnvoll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En faisant des Configurations Comprenez-vous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo Testes padrões Faça O Sentido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facendo I Modelli Abbia Il Significato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνοντας τα πρότυπα να έχουν νόημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haciendo Modelos Tenga Sentido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will analyze organizational patterns in analytical writing by reading, "Oh, the Places You'll Go!" by Dr. Seuss. Students will then apply these patterns to their own writing by creating children's books about success.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer analysieren Organisationsstrukturen
im analytischen Schreiben, indem sie, "OH-, die Plätze lesen, die Sie
gehen!" durch Dr. Seuss. Kursteilnehmer wenden dann diese 
Muster an ihrem eigenen Schreiben an, indem sie Bücher der Kinder 
über Erfolg herstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants analyseront les configurations 
d'organisation dans l'écriture analytique par la lecture, l'"OH, les 
endroits que vous irez!" par Dr. Seuss. Les étudiants 
appliqueront alors ces configurations à leur propre écriture en 
créant les livres des enfants concernant le succès.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes analisarão testes padrões 
organizational na escrita analítica lendo, "Oh, os lugares que você 
irá!" pelo Dr. Seuss. Os estudantes aplicarão então 
estes testes padrões a sua própria escrita criando livros das 
crianças sobre o sucesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi analizzeranno i modelli organizzativi 
nella scrittura analitica leggendo, "l'OH, i posti che andrete!" 
dal Dott. Seuss. Gli allievi allora applicheranno questi 
modelli alla loro propria scrittura creando i libri dei bambini su 
successo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναλύσουν τα οργανωτικά πρότυπα στο 
αναλυτικό γράψιμο με την ανάγνωση, "OH, οι θέσεις που θα 
πάτε!" από το Δρ Seuss. Οι σπουδαστές θα εφαρμόσουν
έπειτα αυτά τα πρότυπα στο γράψιμό τους με τη δημιουργία των 
βιβλίων των παιδιών για την επιτυχία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes analizarán modelos de 
organización en la escritura analítica leyendo, "Oh, los lugares que
usted irá!" por el Dr. Seuss. Los estudiantes entonces 
aplicarán estos modelos a su propia escritura creando los libros de 
los niños acerca del éxito.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:HEATHER BOWER
FN:HEATHER BOWER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202596</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107466</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/making-patterns-make-sense</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
